html:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including ABN Amro Bank, Ferguson and Swiss Re, on Monday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* ABN Amro Bank NV ABNd.AS: Berenberg cuts to sell from hold

* Befimmo SA BEFB.BR: Kepler Cheuvreux cuts to hold from buy

* Ferguson FERG.L: HSBC raises to buy from hold

* Swiss Re AG SRENH.S: Berenberg cuts to hold from buy

* Telefonica TEF.MC: Barclays raises to equal weight from underweight

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Monday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Abcam Plc ABCA.L: Liberum cuts target price to 1250p from 1450p

* Acerinox SA ACX.MC: Jefferies raises target price to EUR 16 from EUR 15.50

* ABN Amro Bank NV ABNd.AS: Berenberg cuts to sell from hold
